contentPopupBlock_2: Welcome to Peeranha. We're glad you're here and ready to make your first publication. There are just a few simple rules we all follow around here:
contentPopupBlock_3: 1. Make sure your posts are related to a particular community.
contentPopupBlock_4: 2. Do a bit of research to be sure the same post hasn't been published before.
contentPopupBlock_5: 3. Answers have to actually answer the question, and not just be a comment.
contentPopupBlock_6: 4. Be sure your answer provides valuable information and isn't just a repeat of what's already been said.
contentPopupBlock_7: And the most important rule is to be polite and friendly to other users.
suggestInterestingComm: Suggest a community, which will be interesting to you and 100 other users who will vote for it.
iUnderstand: I understand that this operation does not remove my account on Telos blockchain. Account is removed only from wallet service.
iHaveBackup: I have back up for my Telos private keys.

moderationPermitions.title: Moderator permissions
moderationPermitions.givePermissionsDescription: Allows you to give and revoke community moderator permission.
moderationPermitions.permissionInfiniteDescription: Allows you to delete posts, answers and comments in one click
moderationPermitions.permissionIgnoreRatingDescription: Allows you to perform actions that are rating restricted
moderationPermitions.permissionCreateCommunityDescription: Allows you to instantly create a community
moderationPermitions.permissionCreateTagDescription: Allows you to instantly create a tag
moderationPermitions.permissionChangePostTypeDescription: Allows you to change post type
moderationPermitions.permissionSelectTopQuestionDescription: Allows you to select a question that will be displayed on "Top" page
moderationPermitions.permissionOfficialAnswerDescription: Allows you to post an official answer
